name: Love Song
statement: Petya once wrote a sad love song and shared it to Vasya. The song is a string consisting of lowercase English letters. Vasya made up $$$q$$$ questions about this song. Each question is about a subsegment of the song starting from the $$$l$$$-th letter to the $$$r$$$-th letter. Vasya considers a substring made up from characters on this segment and repeats each letter in the subsegment $$$k$$$ times, where $$$k$$$ is the index of the corresponding letter in the alphabet. For example, if the question is about the substring " abbcb ", then Vasya repeats letter ' a ' once, each of the letters ' b ' twice, letter ' c " three times, so that the resulting string is " abbbbcccbb ", its length is $$$10$$$. Vasya is interested about the length of the resulting string. Help Petya find the length of each string obtained by Vasya.
inputFormat: The first line contains two integers $$$n$$$ and $$$q$$$ ($$$1\leq n\leq 100\,000$$$, $$$1\leq q \leq 100\,000$$$) — the length of the song and the number of questions. The second line contains one string $$$s$$$ — the song, consisting of $$$n$$$ lowercase letters of English letters. Vasya's questions are contained in the next $$$q$$$ lines. Each line contains two integers $$$l$$$ and $$$r$$$ ($$$1 \leq l \leq r \leq n$$$) — the bounds of the question.
outputFormat: Print $$$q$$$ lines: for each question print the length of the string obtained by Vasya.
